replies.msg: My friend Alfred is an insurance salesman in a bank who gets a basic salary of nine thousand three hundred and twenty dollars per month plus a twenty six percent commission on every sale he makes so he doesn't work by commission only. He honours his parents. He's thankful for what they've done for him. His sister is also a good daughter while his brother needs to be a better son. In the east teachers and parents stress the importance of filial piety which means chinese parental respect. They teach that you need to honour your parents and take care of them. Alf's cousin has stolen his watch recently. It became a point of honour to tell him about it. My brother too felt honour bound to tell him. His dad is a man of honour and high integrity. Both of us are kickboxing fans. In April fred will be fighting chris for the honour of his country. Winning the championship is a matter of personal honour, family honour and national honour. Recently his church held a banquet in honour of fred. Alfred asked me whether I could fo him the honour of accompanying him to the banquet which I did. It was a signal honour to nest fred. Fred said humbly "it's a great honour to have you here Alfred" We asked him.if he would do us the honour of becoming our grappling coach. He said "we'll have to see" A couple of waiters did the honours and greeted the guests at the door. After we sat down fred asked the waitress "will you do the honours and cut us a piece of chicken?" Fred said to us "I'd be honoured if you would come and see my fight in april" We gave him an affirmative response. Last year the chairman said to him "I would be honoured if you attended the hall of fame ceremony" which he did. He was honoured for his performance in his last fight. Besides winning the championship he was honored with an award for excellence in grappling. Some people bought front row tickets at half price or less due to a computer problem but the organisation stated they would honour these tickets nonetheless which could cost a million dollars in lost earnings. Alf's great grandfather obtained.a commission as a senior officer in the army and was buried with full military honours. His uncle.was broke several years ago because he bet the ranch on his company which went bankrupt later. He managed to honour his debts in two years. Alfred is a bunny lover. He has a Holland lop and a Netherland dwarf rabbit. In accordance with animal law in osaka if your pet is a social animal you must have at least two of then living together. Most citizens honour it. by the way I've read in the newspapers that some customers were promised to get their money back if they weren't happy about the products but later they found out they'd been sold down the river as so far they have been unable to contact the swindler. The scammer didn't honor the contracts
